alert.note: Alert for Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:52AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Duval, La Salle, Webb, McMullen and west central Live Oak Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 251 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Los Angeles to 15 miles north of Ranchitos Las Lomas to near Laredo Community College. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Cotulla, Freer, Encinal, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Rio Bravo, El Cenizo, Cross, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge, Fort Ewell Site, United South High School, Artesia Wells, Aguilares, Calliham, Gardendale, Zella, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo and Bruni. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 82. US Highway 59 between mile markers 746 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 676 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
